99 CLUB LEICESTER SQUARE COMEDY

Use the buttons to add items to your basket, then click "PROCEED" to continue to the next page.
We do not post out tickets. See faqs for more info.

London 99 Club @ Storm Nightclub

Tue 20th Dec, 2011

www.99clubcomedy.com

The 99 Club is the Critics' choice for comedy. It's not hard to see why - they consistently deliver the best live comedians around, performing at a friendly and well-run club.

That's why the 99 Club has repeatedly been Critic's Choice in Timeout and garnered a total of over 100 Timeout recommended stars. And that's why the club has repeatedly been Critic's Pick or Choice or "Must See" event in The Evening Standard, The Metro, The London Lite and even the Daily Mirror!

The club's policy of always booking the finest acts on the "comedy circuit" has meant that the major names who've played there over the years range from the likes of Frank Skinner and Lee Mack to a younger generation of stars like Jimmy Carr and Russell Brand. Who knows which of their current acts will be household names in years to come - but one thing you can know for certain is that an evening at the 99 club is an evening of assured, critically acclaimed comedy.
Our flagship venue, Storm Nightclub is located directly on Leicester Square. There are seated and standing tickets available. The club does not admit stag nights or under 18s. No refunds. For bookings of 10 or more customers the club will ask you to sign a "behaviour-bond" & give a £40.00 refundable deposit.
99 CLUB LEICESTER SQUARE - COMEDY & BUFFET & NIGHTCLUB ENTRY - £30.00
NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE  
99 CLUB LEICESTER SQUARE - COMEDY & NIGHTCLUB ENTRY - £20.00
 
99 CLUB LEICESTER SQUARE - STANDING TICKET - £10.00
